mainText:
I write to you today, not only to express my dearest respect for 
such an amazing human being, but to acknowledge that Steve Jobs does not 
only represent a revolutionary in the computer world, nor is he an 
inspiring entrepreneur. Steve Jobs has become a legend that pushes 
humanity forward. He stands among the greatest mankind has to offer. Thank you Steve Jobs, You have been a fatherly figure to me ever since I 
was a little boy. May you rest in peace.
header: In name of a great one
author: Kevin
